disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Comet Spear.

blurb.value: Tap: Pantheon strikes in a direction, damaging all enemies in a line. Hold: Pantheon throws his spear in a line. Empowered: Enemies take extra damage and are slowed.

description.value: Active: Pantheon charges for up to 4 seconds, increasing Comet Spear's range while being slowed by 10%. Comet Spear can be recast at any time within its duration.

description2.value: Recast: Pantheon hurls his spear in the target direction, dealing physical damage to all enemies hit, increased against enemies below 20% of their maximum health but reduced by 30% against minions and by 50% against enemies beyond the first.

leveling2.value: Physical Damage:»75 / 110 / 145 / 180 / 215 (+ 100% bonus AD)«Increased Damage:»155 / 240 / 325 / 410 / 495 (+ 200% bonus AD)«Secondary Physical Damage:»37.5 / 55 / 72.5 / 90 / 107.5 (+ 50% bonus AD)«Increased Secondary Damage:77.5 / 120 / 162.5 / 205 / 247.5 (+ 100% bonus AD)

description3.value: Releasing the ability within 0.35 seconds causes Pantheon to instead thrust his spear in the target direction, dealing the same physical damage to all enemies hit and refunding 50% of Comet Spear's  cooldown. The thrust's damage is not reduced against enemies beyond the first.

description4.value: If Pantheon is interrupted during the charge, or the charge completes without reactivation, Comet Spear is cancelled and the ability is put on full cooldown but refunds  half the mana cost.

description5.value: Mortal Will: Deals an additional 20 − 240 (based on level) (+ 100% bonus AD) bonus physical damage, affected by the previous damage reductions, to all enemies hit and slows them for 2.5 seconds.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Only the ranged version of Comet Spear can be intercepted. Comet Spear will cast from wherever Pantheon is at the end of the cast time. The following table refers for interactions while Pantheon is channeling: Type Charge channel Attacking Disabled Abilities Disabled Movement Allowed Items Usable All the other item-actives are usable Disabled Hextech Protobelt-01 Interrupted by Stopwatch Zhonya's Hourglass Hextech GLP-800 Consumables Usable Spells Usable Barrier Clarity Cleanse Exhaust Ghost Heal Ignite Smite Flash Disabled Teleport Recall Interrupted by Hexflash (Recasts) Interrupted by Death Silencing effects

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Shield Vault.

blurb.value: Pantheon leaps to a target enemy, dealing damage and stunning them. Empowered: Pantheon's next basic attack hits three times, each at reduced damage.

description.value: Active: Pantheon leaps to the front of the target enemy's location, dealing them physical damage and stunning them for 1 second upon arrival.

description2.value: Mortal Will: Pantheon's next basic attack within 4 seconds becomes unstoppable and strikes his target 3 times, dealing 45% − 55% (based on level) AD physical damage per hit, up to 135% − 165% (based on level) AD. Each hit is affected by critical strike modifiers and applies on-hit effects.

description3.value: Empowered Shield Vault resets Pantheon's basic attack timer.

description4.value: The ability can be dodged if the target moves 800 units away.

description5.value: Pantheon will attempt to basic attack the target at the end of the leap.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * The 3 strikes scale with Pantheon's  attack speed. Applies spell damage on the initial vault. Deals default damage on the additional attacks from the empowered ability. The 3 strikes that occurs after Empowered Shield Vault each apply a stack of Mortal Will, even if the attacks are dodged, blocked, or missed while Pantheon is blinded. If Shield Vault is used without Mortal Will beyond Pantheon's basic attack range, the auto attack following will not grant any stack of Conqueror, Electrocute, Phase Rush or Spellthief's Edge.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Aegis Assault.

blurb.value: Pantheon sets his shield in a direction, gaining invulnerability to damage from enemies in that direction and dealing damage continuously. The last hit is extra powerful and still activates if E is canceled early. Empowered: Aegis Assault lasts longer.

description.value: Active: Pantheon braces his shield in the target direction, channeling for 1.5 seconds as well as becoming slowed for between 0% − 50% (based on his movement direction). Aegis Assault cannot be interrupted by crowd control.

description2.value: For the duration, Pantheon is invulnerable against damage dealt by enemies ( turrets included) from the target direction, and deals「 up to 100% AD physical damage over the duration 」「 8.3% AD physical damage every 0.125 seconds 」 in a cone to all enemies struck, reduced by 50% against minions.

description3.value: At the end of the duration, Pantheon slams with his shield after a 0.25-second delay, dealing physical damage. Aegis Assault can be recast after 0.3 seconds.

description4.value: Recast: Pantheon slams with his shield early.

description5.value: Mortal Will: Aegis Assault's duration is increased to 2.5 seconds, dealing「 up to 166.6% AD physical damage over the duration. 」「 8.3% AD physical damage every 0.125 seconds. 」

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: *The initial cast count as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as Spellblade, charging Spellbinder, and stacking Force Pulse. Detonating the ability manually is not. Blink ability damage is calculated before the displacement. Spell shield will only block the slam's damage. The following table refers for interactions while Pantheon is channeling: Type Channel Attacking Disabled Abilities Disabled Movement Allowed Items Usable All the other item-actives are usable Disabled Hextech Protobelt-01 Interrupted by N/A Consumables Usable Spells Usable Barrier Clarity Cleanse Exhaust Ghost Heal Ignite Smite Flash Teleport Disabled Recall Hexflash Interrupted by N/A Interrupted by Death

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Grand Starfall.

blurb.value: Pantheon leaps into the air and then hurtles back toward a target location, damaging enemies as he passes through. Mortal Will activates immediately when he lands.

description.value: Active: Pantheon channels for 2 seconds to leap high into the air, then marks and reveals his destination before crashing down along the target area 1.85 seconds later, reappearing at the target location 0.75 seconds later and afterwards instantly readying Mortal Will. Pantheon remains vanished and crowd control immune until the landing is complete after the channel.

description2.value: The landing deals magic damage to all enemies along the crashing path, decreased by up to 50% at the edges of the area.

description3.value: Grand Starfall is put on a 30 second  cooldown if the channel is canceled.

description4.value: Grand Starfall will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Abilities that target Pantheon will redirect to the last location. Pinging the ability will inform allies in chat which visible enemy champions are in range of Grand Starfall. Pantheon is considered to be in his original casting position even after leaping, but he will blink to the target location the moment he lands. Using Grand Starfall will inform allies with a ping. The following table refers for interactions while Pantheon is channeling: Type Channel Attacking Disabled Abilities Disabled Movement Disabled Items Usable N/A Disabled All items are disabled Interrupted by N/A Consumables Disabled Spells Usable N/A Disabled Barrier Clarity Cleanse Exhaust Ghost Heal Ignite Smite Flash Teleport Recall Hexflash Mark Dash Interrupted by N/A Interrupted by Death Grounding effects Immobilizing effects Silencing effects
